item.description:
What: Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Grouop

When: SUNDAY June 13th, Holliston, 12:30-2:30 and 3 - 5 pm.

Where:
The Meadows
140 Summer Street
Holliston, MA 01746
(508) 429 1500

Dear Members,

Our next meet will be June 13th, from 12:30 - 5 pm, at Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer Street, Holliston, MA.

Please RSVP for one of the two time periods:

12:30-2:30

3:00-5:00 pm.

Also, let me know what food or beverage you want to bring for our refreshment table.

I look forward to seeing you all there!!!!

Small dog best,
Kim

Learn more here:
http://maltese.meetup...

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: MASS SMALL BREED DOGS,June 13th, 12:30-5 pm THE MEADOWS, Holliston, MA
